entry.title: Russian Language in Central Asia (Russian for travelling)

media:group.media:title: Russian Language in Central Asia (Russian for travelling)
media:group.media:description:
Do Russian popular in Central Asia? Do people still speak Russian in Uzbekistan and Tajikistan? How Central Asia looks like?
In this Russian Vlog I'm going to Uzbekistan and Tajikistan in order to find out is it comfortable to travel in Central Asia if you know some Russian?

entry.title: Vlog in Russian # 32 - I CAN FLY!

media:group.media:title: Vlog in Russian # 32 - I CAN FLY!
media:group.media:description:
Giving "emotion" as a gift is a very common thing in Russia.
Once I talked about one of my birthday gifts when my girlfriend and I went to ethnic park called Etmomir. Now 6 months later I used another "certificate" and went flying!

entry.title: Verbs of motion with prefixes (Russian) - EXAMPLES (Lesson 4)

media:group.media:title: Verbs of motion with prefixes (Russian) - EXAMPLES (Lesson 4)
media:group.media:description:
Hey ya! It's time to practice more the most confusing part of the Russian language which is verbs of motion with prefixes. Today we will look at some examples of those words we've passed in our free Verbs of motion online course.
I hope it will help you, guys, looking forward for your comments and questions!:)

entry.title: Russia By Bike | Movie for learning Russian with subtitles

media:group.media:title: Russia By Bike | Movie for learning Russian with subtitles
media:group.media:description:
This is my first movie for learning Russian with subtitles. I aimed to show you Russia as it is and include as much common Russian words and phrases as I can.
I traveled to a northern Russian city called Petrozavodsk by motorbike and filmed all things that happened to me.

entry.title: Learn 4 Most Common Russian SWEAR Words (Russian Slang)

media:group.media:title: Learn 4 Most Common Russian SWEAR Words (Russian Slang)
media:group.media:description:
These 4 common Russian swear (slang) words form hundreds variations that every Russian uses everyday!
I don't want you to learn how to swear in Russian, but I want you to UNDERSTAND some popular slang words and phrases they form, because It's everyday Russian and you'll hear all these bad words many many times.
►Your Practice (translate it in English):
Маша послала Мишу на хер, так как она постоянно охеревала от всей фигни, которая происходила между ними. Миша был офигенным парнем, но постоянно страдал всякой хуйнёй. Он находил на улице какие-то хреновины, приносил их в дом и начинал херачить ими всю мебель. Поэтому их квартира была очень фиговая. Однажды Маша сказала: «Какого фига ты херачишь нашу квартиру? Иди ты на хер!»
Миша ушёл. Но даже находясь «на хере» он всё равно ________ всё вокруг!
►Listen to everyday Russian in our podcast: https://www.russianwithmax.com/category/russian-podcast/
►Membership program for improving you Russian: https://www.russianwithmax.com/russian-audio-lessons/

entry.title: Russian Podcast - HOW MUCH is it to travel in Russia?

media:group.media:title: Russian Podcast - HOW MUCH is it to travel in Russia?
media:group.media:description:
Let's talk about travelling in Russia in this LIVE Russian Podcast show for intermediate students. I'm telling stories you are asking questions :) How much is it ti travel in Russia? How much does gasoline cost? How much do hotels cost in Russia? What's the best and cheapest way to travel in Russia?

entry.title: Russian vocabulary words to talk about daily routine - Cleaning

media:group.media:title: Russian vocabulary words to talk about daily routine - Cleaning
media:group.media:description:
Good day, folks!
In this Live Russian Vocabulary series we will talk about Cleaning. Sometimes it's very difficult to pick up a certain word for our daily routine or daily life. Russian learners struggle with it quite often so I make this video to help them learn popular Russian daily-life words and phrases.
